column1: TA6.12;The by-catch of species is eliminated or reduced to a level that allows species recovery and conservation;TA1.9;+;The reduction of greenhouse gas emissions in the energy sector

column1: TA1.9;The contribution of the sectors covered by the EU ETS with respect to the EU Climate ambition should be of -62 % compared to 2005 (increasing the linear emissions reduction factor from 2.2 % per year up to 4.4 %);TA6.12;-;The implementation of TA1.9
column2: which aims to reduce greenhouse gas emissions in the energy sector
column3: may have a negative impact on the by-catch of species
column4: as the increased focus on renewable energy sources and reduced emissions could lead to the displacement of fishing activities and increased by-catch in other areas.
